assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: R Swenker reports financial assistance from Novartis. MCY de Wit reports grants from Dutch Epilepsy Foundation, and grants and non-financial support from Novartis outside the submitted work; and the Erasmus MC received honoraria from Novartis for educational lectures presented by the author. The remaining authors declare no conflict of interest.
